plot: An archaeological expedition journeys to Manitoba, Canada, in search of a legendary crucifix supposedly buried in an ancient Viking grave.
title: Lost in the Barrens II: The Curse of the Viking Grave
plot_es: An archaeological expedition journeys to Manitoba, Canada, in search of a legendary crucifix supposedly buried in an ancient Viking grave.
original_name: Lost in the Barrens II: The Curse of the Viking Grave
plot_en: An archaeological expedition journeys to Manitoba, Canada, in search of a legendary crucifix supposedly buried in an ancient Viking grave.
